column5: Special report: The alewife question  A 3 part report from September 2009  Part 1 - Alewives: Should Great Lakes managers kill ‘em or keep ‘em?  Part 2 - Alewives: The trouble they cause and the salmon that love them  Part 3 - Great Lakes fish in the balance; biologists have little control
very interesting read... thanks for sharing. puts into perspective just how delicate are our fisheries
